function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High population density and movement in the residence","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large number of rooms in each zone of the residence","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Different occupancy patterns in households increase the risk of disease spread due to movement of people between locations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High occupancy in the bathrooms during morning routines increases the risk of disease transmission due to shared use of facilities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent use of electric appliances leads to increased internal heat gain, potentially contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Occupants habitually leaving lights on in unoccupied rooms may lead to poor ventilation and air quality, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Free electricity in kuwait may encourage excessive use of appliances and lighting, leading to higher energy consumption and potential environmental impacts.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High density of tv sets in living rooms and bedrooms increases the risk of airborne disease transmission within households.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular use of vacuum cleaners can lead to the dispersion and circulation of dust, allergens, and pathogens within indoor environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Refrigerators are commonly used in kuwaiti residences for storing food, and the presence of multiple units in each residence may lead to cross-contamination if not maintained properly.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Centralized a/c systems operating all day long and throughout the summer season","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to control a/c unit cycles based on weather conditions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient thermostat settings leading to increased energy consumption","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mismatched schedules of lights and occupancy leading to energy waste","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cultural differences impacting energy consumption patterns","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Habit of leaving lights on when rooms are unoccupied due to cheap electricity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Setting the a/c thermostat to lower temperatures than the comfort range","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Little changes in occupants’ attitude towards energy conservation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor urban communities are most vulnerable to vector-borne diseases vbds due to lack of infrastructure and poor living conditions.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of community participation in disease control efforts reduces the effectiveness of preventative measures and policies.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of integration of health priorities in sustainable development goals could lead to neglect of vbd risks in urban environments.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about health care costs of urban sprawl","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heightened surveillance and mosquito control for urban vbd risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of investments in improving water storage, sanitation, and drainage in low-income areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of indicators and targets for promoting sustainable urban development","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate infrastructure for controlling vector-borne disease risks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainties surrounding the spread of the virus","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of entire cities and stringent measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declaration of a global public health emergency","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of collaborative leading to legal challenges and regulatory non-compliance.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to big data results in higher economic returns and increased influence risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Restricted sharing of critical health data between economies creates barriers to addressing global health challenges.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global movement of people leading to enhanced transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data
